verses.verse: And God<WH430> blessed<WH1288> Noah<WH5146> and his sons<WH1121>, and said<WH559> unto them<WH6509>, Be fruitful, and multiply<WH7235>, and replenish<WH4390> the earth<WH776>.

And the fear of you<WH4172> and the dread of you<WH2844> shall be upon every beast<WH2416> of the earth<WH776>, and upon every bird<WH5775> of the heavens<WH8064>; with all wherewith the ground<WH127> teemeth<WH7430>, and all the fishes<WH1709> of the sea<WH3220>, into your hand<WH3027> are they delivered<WH5414>.
Every moving thing<WH7431> that liveth<WH2416> shall be food<WH402> for you<WH3418>; as the green herb<WH6212> have I given you all<WH5414>.
But <WH389> flesh<WH1320> with the life<WH5315> thereof<WH1818>, which is the blood thereof<WH398>, shall ye not eat.

And surely<WH389> your blood<WH1818>, the blood of your lives<WH5315>, will I require<WH1875>; at the hand<WH3027> of every beast<WH2416> will I require it<WH1875>: and at the hand<WH3027> of man<WH120>, even at the hand<WH3027> of every man<WH120>'s brother<WH251>, will I require<WH1875> the life<WH5315> of man<WH120>.
Whoso sheddeth<WH8210> man<WH120>'s blood<WH1818>, by man<WH120> shall his blood<WH1818> be shed<WH8210>: For in the image<WH6754> of God<WH430> made<WH6213> he man<WH120>.
And you<WH6509>, be ye fruitful, and multiply<WH7235>; bring forth abundantly<WH8317> in the earth<WH776>, and multiply therein<WH7235>.
And God<WH430> spake<WH559> unto Noah<WH5146>, and to his sons<WH1121> with him<WH559>, saying,
And I<WH6965>, behold, I establish my covenant<WH1285> with you<WH2233>, and with your seed after you<WH310>;

and with every living<WH2416> creature<WH5315> that is with you<WH5775>, the birds, the cattle<WH929>, and every beast<WH2416> of the earth<WH776> with you<WH3318>; of all that go out of the ark<WH8392>, even every beast<WH2416> of the earth<WH776>.

And I will establish<WH6965> my covenant<WH1285> with you<WH1320>; neither shall all flesh be cut off<WH3772> any more by the waters<WH4325> of the flood<WH3999>; neither shall there any more be a flood<WH3999> to destroy<WH7843> the earth<WH776>.

And God<WH430> said<WH559>, This is the token<WH226> of the covenant<WH1285> which I<WH589> make<WH5414> between me and you and every living<WH2416> creature<WH5315> that is with you<WH5769>, for perpetual generations<WH1755>:
I do set<WH5414> my bow<WH7198> in the cloud<WH6051>, and it shall be for a token<WH226> of a covenant<WH1285> between me and the earth<WH776>.
And it shall come to pass<WH6049>, when I bring a cloud<WH6051> over the earth<WH776>, that the bow<WH7198> shall be seen<WH7200> in the cloud<WH6051>,

and I will remember<WH2142> my covenant<WH1285>, which is between me and you and every living<WH2416> creature<WH5315> of all flesh<WH1320>; and the waters<WH4325> shall no more<WH5750> become a flood<WH3999> to destroy<WH7843> all flesh<WH1320>.

And the bow<WH7198> shall be in the cloud<WH6051>; and I will look upon it<WH7200>, that I may remember<WH2142> the everlasting<WH5769> covenant<WH1285> between<WH996> God<WH430> and<WH996> every living<WH2416> creature<WH5315> of all flesh<WH1320> that is upon the earth<WH776>.
And God<WH430> said<WH559> unto Noah<WH5146>, This is the token<WH226> of the covenant<WH1285> which I have established<WH6965> between me and all flesh<WH1320> that is upon the earth<WH776>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Noah<WH5146>, that went forth<WH3318> from the ark<WH8392>, were Shem<WH8035>, and Ham<WH2526>, and Japheth<WH3315>: and Ham<WH2526> is the father<WH1> of Canaan<WH3667>.
These three<WH7969> were the sons<WH1121> of Noah<WH5146>: and of these was the whole earth<WH776> overspread<WH5310>.
And Noah<WH5146> began<WH2490> to be a husbandman<WH376>, and planted<WH5193> a vineyard<WH3754>:
and he drank<WH8354> of the wine<WH3196>, and was drunken<WH7937>; and he was uncovered<WH1540> within<WH8432> his tent<WH168>.
And Ham<WH2526>, the father<WH1> of Canaan<WH3667>, saw<WH7200> the nakedness<WH6172> of his father<WH1>, and told<WH5046> his two<WH8147> brethren<WH251> without<WH2351>.

And Shem<WH8035> and Japheth<WH3315> took<WH3947> a garment<WH8071>, and laid<WH7760> it upon both<WH8147> their shoulders<WH7926>, and went<WH3212> backward<WH322>, and covered<WH3680> the nakedness<WH6172> of their father<WH1>; and their faces<WH6440> were backward<WH322>, and they saw<WH7200> not their father<WH1>'s nakedness<WH6172>.
And Noah<WH5146> awoke<WH3364> from his wine<WH3196>, and knew<WH3045> what his youngest<WH6996> son<WH1121> had done unto him<WH6213>.
And he said<WH559>, Cursed<WH779> be Canaan<WH3667>; A servant<WH5650> of servants<WH5650> shall he be unto his brethren<WH251>.
And he said<WH559>, Blessed<WH1288> be Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Shem<WH8035>; And let Canaan<WH3667> be<WH1961> his servant<WH5650>.
God <WH430> enlarge<WH6601> Japheth<WH3315>, And let him dwell<WH7931> in the tents<WH168> of Shem<WH8035>; And let Canaan<WH3667> be his servant<WH5650>.
And Noah<WH5146> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> the flood<WH3999> three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141>.
And all the days<WH3117> of Noah<WH5146> were nine<WH8672> hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141>: And he died<WH4191>.
